<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
 Packages.java.lang,
 Packages.javax.crypto,
 Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
 Packages.java.io,
 Packages.java.util,
 Packages.java.util.zip,
);

with(javaImport){
 function decrypt(str){
 	
 	var h=result.substring(16);
 	var u=result.substring(0,16);
 	var k = 'Shuew237HSFH242s';
 	var m=java.aesBase64DecodeToByteArray(h,k ,"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", u);
 var arr1 = new Array(m.length+1);
 arr1.push(m);
 arr1[m.length]=0;
 var inflaterInputStream = new InflaterInputStream(new ByteArrayInputStream(m));
 var byteArrayOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream(512);
 while (true) {
 var read = inflaterInputStream.read();
 if (read != -1) {
 byteArrayOutputStream.write(read);
 } else {
 	byteArrayOutputStream.close();
 return byteArrayOutputStream.toString();
 }
 }
 }
}
decrypt(result)
</js>$.data

bookSourceComment:
2022-08-15
@tjjj812
可搜，有分类，有预览图，能下载
在线看网站是按照字数分页的，所以没有目录，最佳食用方式是下下来看。
把【类型】改为【文本】就可以在线看了。
不要用网页版编辑这个书源！！！
不要用网页版编辑这个书源！！！
不要用网页版编辑这个书源！！！
网页版有bug
如果编辑了之后要到手机端把【类型】改为【文件】，
把详情页下载url规则改为
【@js:java.get("bookDownURL")】
原看帮网，搞了一遍通过详情预处理来进行解析，并通过get方法获取文件地址的方式获取文件，站点也有ZIP可下，有需要的可以改成下载ZIP
需要设置本地文件存储位置才能正确下载。
用手机写js写的脑仁疼。。。

<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status'),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + '▪' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
		intro: og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, ''),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

result.toArray().slice(0, 10).map(el => {

		intro: og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, ''),
		cover: og('image'),
		url: url,
	};
}); 
</js>

bookSourceComment:
◎开始使用时(搜索或调试)会自动游客登陆,若有账号请再输入账号登陆
◎注意重复登录现在会触发验证码检查, 有封号的风险
◎若要切换账号,请在[登陆界面]菜单中清除账号和密码进行[游客登录],再输入账号和密码登陆
◎重复{点击√}登陆会在一段时间内无法账号登陆(需要等几个小时);如果需要请切换网络[wifi/数据]重新尝试登陆,登陆成功后请勿频繁切换账号
◎若报错请删除登陆按钮里面的登录头(登陆界面右上角的选项里),并且清除Cookie后重新再次进行登录
◎因为操作过多，若点击登录√无反应请等待一会
◎特性: 登陆|游客登录|签到|书架|发现页|购买（需要升级到最新版本≥3.22.081219）
loginUrl:
<js>
// 工具类
var key = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("lXsAUe1NZEw6tAxM9w1Tpq2tU4la2+PwM8evj2C+yB0=")
var iv = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")
var aes = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.AES("CBC","PKCS5Padding", key, iv)
var RandomUtil = Packages.cn.hutool.core.util.RandomUtil
// 参数
let userInfo = source.getLoginInfoMap()
let username = userInfo['手机号码/邮箱'].trim()
let password = userInfo['密码'].trim()
let app_version = "2.9.290"
let device_token = `shuke_${RandomUtil.randomNumbers(15)}`
let login_token = RandomUtil.randomString(32)
let account = `%E4%B9%A6%E5%AE%A2${RandomUtil.randomNumbers(12)}`
let uuid = `android${java.randomUUID()}`
var params = `app_version=${app_version}&device_token=${device_token}&login_token=${login_token}&account=${account}`
// 账号登录
function login(username, password){
  var loginUrl = `https://sk.hbooker.com/signup/login?${params}&login_name=${username}&passwd=${password}`
  var autoRegUrl = `https://sk.hbooker.com/signup/auto_reg?oauth_union_id=&app_version=${app_version}&gender=1&oauth_open_id=&device_token=${device_token}&channel=TX&oauth_type=&uuid=${uuid}`
  // 是否游客
  let isLogin = !source.getLoginHeader()
  let isAuto = username == '' || password == ''
  if(isAuto && !isLogin){ 
     throw new Error("请勿重复登录,如若需要请清除登录头和Cookie")
  }
  var url = isAuto ? autoRegUrl : loginUrl
  // 获取登录信息
  let res = JSON.parse(aes.decryptStr(java.ajax(url)))
  if(res.tip) {
    throw new Error(isAuto ? '自动登陆失败,请输入账号或切换网络重新登陆' : '账号登陆失败,请尝试切换网络或者等待几小时后重新登陆')
  }
  let login_token = res.data.login_token
  let user_code = res.data.user_code
  let reader_name = res.data.reader_info.reader_name
  let account = res.data.reader_info.account
  let rest_hlb = res.data.prop_info.rest_hlb
  java.toast(isAuto ? '自动登陆成功,若有账号请输入账号进行登陆' : `${reader_name}【剩余欢乐币:${rest_hlb}】,登录成功!`)
  // 获取书架
  let bookList = java.ajax(`https://sk.hbooker.com/bookshelf/get_shelf_list?app_version=${app_version}&device_token=${device_token}&login_token=${login_token}&account=${account}`)
  let shelf_list = JSON.parse(aes.decryptStr(bookList)).data.shelf_list[0]
  let shelf_id = shelf_list.shelf_id
  let reader_id = shelf_list.reader_id
  // 登录完成
  let header = {
    "app_version": String(app_version),
    "device_token": String(device_token),
    "login_token": String(login_token),
    "account": encodeURIComponent(account),
    "user_code": String(user_code),
    "shelf_id": String(shelf_id),
    "reader_name": encodeURIComponent(reader_name),
    "reader_id": String(reader_id),
    "rest_hlb": String(rest_hlb)
  }
  return JSON.stringify(header)
}
// 写入登录头
header = login(username,password)
source.putLoginHeader(header)
</js>

<js>
(function(key,page){
if(!source.getLoginHeaderMap()){
  // 自动登陆
  source.login()
}
let headerMap = source.getLoginHeaderMap()
let app_version = headerMap['app_version']
let device_token = headerMap['device_token']
let login_token = headerMap['login_token']
let account = headerMap['account']
return `/bookcity/get_filter_search_book_list?app_version=${app_version}&count=10&page=${page - 1}&use_daguan=1&device_token=${device_token}&login_token=${login_token}&category_index=0&key=${key}&account=${account}`
})(key,page)
</js>

var headerMap = source.getLoginHeaderMap()
// 参数
let app_version = headerMap['app_version']
let account = headerMap['account']
let login_token = headerMap['login_token']
let device_token = headerMap['device_token']
let rest_hlb = headerMap['rest_hlb']
let params = `app_version=${app_version}&device_token=${device_token}&login_token=${login_token}&account=${account}`
let key = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("lXsAUe1NZEw6tAxM9w1Tpq2tU4la2+PwM8evj2C+yB0=")
let iv = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")
let aes = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.AES("CBC","PKCS5Padding", key, iv)
// 获取数据
result = aes.decryptStr(result)
let res = JSON.parse(result)
// 签到
if(/get_task_bonus_with_sign_recommend.*/.test(baseUrl)){
  let hlb = res.tip ? 0 : Number(res.data.bonus.hlb)
  // 获取书币
  let walletUrl = `https://app.happybooker.cn/reader/get_wallet_info?${params}`
  let walletRes = JSON.parse(aes.decryptStr(java.ajax(walletUrl)))
  rest_hlb = walletRes.tip ? rest_hlb : Number(walletRes.data.wallet_info.rest_hlb) + hlb
  let message = res.tip ? `${res.tip},当前剩余${rest_hlb}欢乐币`:`签到成功,获得${hlb}欢乐币,当前剩余${rest_hlb}欢乐币`
  source.putLoginHeader(Object.assign(headerMap,{'rest_hlb': String(rest_hlb)}))
  java.toast(message)
  result={}
} else if(res.tip) { 
   java.toast(res.tip)
   throw new Error(res.tip)
   result={}
}
</js>

let iv = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")

let device_token = source.getLoginHeaderMap()['device_token']

   java.toast(res.tip)
   throw new Error(res.tip)
}

 chList.push({title: volList.division_name,voltype: true})
 volList.chapter_list.forEach(item=>{
   chList.push({

    isVip: item.is_paid&&item.auth_access==0,
    isPay: item.auth_access,
    url: `https://sk.hbooker.com/chapter/get_chapter_command?app_version=${app_version}&chapter_id=${item.chapter_id}&login_token=${login_token}&account=${account}&device_token=${device_token}`,
    info: `更新时间 ${item.mtime} 字数 ${item.word_count}`
   })
 })
})
chList
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
// 解密
function decrypt(str1, str2){
  let key = java.base64DecodeToByteArray(java.digestBase64Str(str2,"sha256"))
  let iv = java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")
  let aes = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.AES("CBC","PKCS5Padding", key, iv)
  return aes.decryptStr(str1)
}
let headerMap = source.getLoginHeaderMap()
// 获取密钥
let app_version = headerMap['app_version']
let device_token = headerMap['device_token']
let account = headerMap['account']
let login_token = headerMap['login_token']
let rest_hlb = headerMap['rest_hlb']
let key = "zG2nSeEfSHfvTCHy5LCcqtBbQehKNLXn"
let cid = baseUrl.match(/chapter_id=(\d+)/)[1]
let result = JSON.parse(decrypt(result,key))
let tip = result.tip
if(tip){
 java.toast(tip)
 throw new Error(tip)	
}
let cmd = result.data.command
// 正文内容
let body = java.ajax(`https://sk.hbooker.com/chapter/get_cpt_ifm?chapter_command=${cmd}&app_version=${app_version}&chapter_id=${cid}&login_token=${login_token}&account=${account}&device_token=${device_token}`)
let chInfo = JSON.parse(decrypt(body,key)).data.chapter_info
let unit_hlb = java.put('unit_hlb', chInfo.unit_hlb)
let content = decrypt(chInfo.txt_content,cmd)
let isPay = chInfo.is_paid && chInfo.auth_access == 0
let payText = `\n本章是VIP章节，购买后才能阅读\n本章需要${unit_hlb}币, 您有${rest_hlb}币,请点击右上角的购买按钮购买本章(请勿乱点)，购买后自动加入到个人书架！`
isPay ? content + payText : content 
</js>

bookSourceComment:
使用:先输入手机号然后点√发送验证码,后输入验证码登陆
注意:若发现出现错误,请重新打开关闭发现页
支持:验证码登陆|购买|签到|发现|书架
loginUrl:
<js>
var username = String(source.getLoginInfoMap().get("手机号"))
var passwd = String(source.getLoginInfoMap().get("验证码"))
// 工具类
var md5Key = 'NpkTYvpvhJjEog8Y051gQDHmReY54z5t3F0zSd9QEFuxWGqfC8g8Y4GPuabq0KPdxArlji4dSnnHCARHnkqYBLu7iIw55ibTo18'
var desKey = Packages.java.lang.String('ZUreQN0Epkpxh3pooWOgixjTfPwumCTYWzYTQ7SMgDnqFLQ1s9tqpVhkGf02we89moQwhSQ07DVzc3LWupRgbVvm29aYeY7zyFN').getBytes('UTF_8')
var des = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.DES("ECB","PKCS5Padding", desKey)
if(!username) throw new Error("请输入手机号")
// 发送验证码
if(username != 0 && passwd == 0) {
  let timestamp = Date.now()
  let requestId = java.randomUUID().replace('-','')
  let param = des.encryptBase64(JSON.stringify({phone: username,smsType: "1",timestamp: timestamp}))
  let sign = String(java.digestHex(java.base64Encode(`param=${param}&requestId=${requestId}&timestamp=${timestamp}&key=${md5Key}`),'md5')).toUpperCase()
  let data = JSON.stringify({
    param: param,
    requestId: requestId,
    sign: sign,
    timestamp: timestamp
  })
  let op = JSON.stringify({ method: "POST", body: data })
  let res = JSON.parse(java.ajax(`https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/login/getPhoneCode,${op}`))
  if(res.code != '200') throw new Error(res.msg)
  java.toast("验证码已发送，请输入验证码登录")
}
// 验证码登录
if(username != 0 && passwd != 0) {
  let timestamp = Date.now()
  let requestId = java.randomUUID().replace('-','')
  let param = des.encryptBase64(JSON.stringify({phone: username,phoneCode: passwd,timestamp: timestamp}))
  let sign = String(java.digestHex(java.base64Encode(`param=${param}&requestId=${requestId}&timestamp=${timestamp}&key=${md5Key}`),'md5')).toUpperCase()
  let data = JSON.stringify({
    param: param,
    requestId: requestId,
    sign: sign,
    timestamp: timestamp
  })
  let op = JSON.stringify({ method: "POST", body: data})
  let res = JSON.parse(java.ajax(`https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/login/phone,${op}`))
  if(res.code != '200') throw new Error(res.msg)
let userInfo = res.data.userInfo source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify({ "token": userInfo.token}))
  java.toast("登陆成功")
}
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
function getParams(params,isPost){
 let desKey = Packages.java.lang.String('ZUreQN0Epkpxh3pooWOgixjTfPwumCTYWzYTQ7SMgDnqFLQ1s9tqpVhkGf02we89moQwhSQ07DVzc3LWupRgbVvm29aYeY7zyFN').getBytes('UTF_8')
 let des = Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.DES("ECB","PKCS5Padding", desKey)
 let md5Key = 'NpkTYvpvhJjEog8Y051gQDHmReY54z5t3F0zSd9QEFuxWGqfC8g8Y4GPuabq0KPdxArlji4dSnnHCARHnkqYBLu7iIw55ibTo18'
 let timestamp = Date.now()
 let requestId = java.randomUUID().replace('-','')
 let param = des.encryptBase64(JSON.stringify(Object.assign(params,{'timestamp': timestamp})))
 let sign = String(java.digestHex(java.base64Encode(`param=${param}&requestId=${requestId}&timestamp=${timestamp}&key=${md5Key}`),'md5')).toUpperCase()
 let data = JSON.stringify({
    param: param,
    requestId: requestId,
    sign: sign,
    timestamp: timestamp
 })
 return isPost? JSON.stringify({ method: "POST", body: data }) :`timestamp=${timestamp}&requestId=${requestId}&sign=${sign}&param=${encodeURIComponent(param)}`
}

res.data.classifyList.forEach(o=> {
  let params1 = getParams({"firstClassify":o.classifyId,"rankType":"1","pageNo": 1,"pageSize": 30,"bookType":"1"},false)
  findList.push({"title": o.classifyName, "url": `https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/book/getBookListByParams?${params1}`,"style": style1})
  let len =  o.childList.length
  len>1&&o.childList.forEach((c,i)=>{
  	   let params2 = getParams({"firstClassify":o.classifyId,"rankType":"1","pageNo": 1,"pageSize": 30,"bookType":"1","secondClassify":c.classifyId},false)
  	  let style=i==len-1?style3:style2
    findList.push({"title":c.classifyName, "url": `https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/book/getBookListByParams?${params2}`,"style":style})
  	})
})
// 获取男生标签
findList.push({"title": "༺ 男生标签༺","url": '',"style": style1})
res = JSON.parse(java.ajax(`https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/tag/getAppTagList?${getParams({"pageNo":1,"pageSize":99,"bookType":"1"},false)}`))
let tagLen =  res.data.list.length
res.data.list.forEach((o,i)=> {
  let params = getParams({"tagId":o.tagId,"rankType":"1","pageNo": 1,"pageSize": 30,"bookType":"1"},false)
  let style=i==tagLen-1?style3:style2
  findList.push({"title": o.tagName, "url": `https://api.hwnovel.com/api/ciyuanji/client/book/getBookListByTagId?${params}`,"style": style})
})
JSON.stringify(findList)
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var desKey = Packages.java.lang.String('ZUreQN0Epkpxh3pooWOgixjTfPwumCTYWzYTQ7SMgDnqFLQ1s9tqpVhkGf02we89moQwhSQ07DVzc3LWupRgbVvm29aYeY7zyFN').getBytes('UTF_8')
let content=Packages.cn.hutool.crypto.symmetric.DES("ECB","PKCS5Padding", desKey).decryptStr(java.base64DecodeToByteArray(java.getString("data.chapter.content")))
let isBuy = java.getString("data.isBuy")=='0'
let isFee = java.getString("data.isFee")=='0'
let price = java.getString("data.price")
let payText = `\n本章是VIP章节，购买后才能阅读\n本章需要${price}币`
isBuy&&!isFee ? content + payText  : content
</js>

ok=k[key]+"·最近"+"::https://read.luoxx.top/api/book/findBooks?page={{page}}&count=20&type="+key+"&sortField=updateDate&isDesc=true";
s.push(op,oi,ok);
};
s.join("&&")
</js>

2.登陆阅读限免或已购vip章节为空时, 试试书籍详情页, 源变量填：1
3.清除缓存再刷新

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "🔒":""
    let pc_url = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let mob_url = `https://m.qidian.com/book/${bid}/${chapter.id}.html`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${mob_url},{'webView': true}` : pc_url
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, "\x20\x20"),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? "🔒":""
    let href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${href},{'webView': true}` : href
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, "\x20\x20"),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

ruleContent.content:
content={ childNode:[], childNodes: result.match(/nrid="([^"]+)";/)?java.getElements("#"+result.match(/nrid="([^"]+)";/)[1]+"@p").toArray():"", UpWz:function(m, i) { var k = Math.ceil((i + 1) % this.code); k = Math.ceil(m - k); return k }, load:function(){ this.code=String(result).match(/codeurl="(\d+)"/)[1]; var e =String(java.base64Decode(java.getString('[name=client]@content'))).split(/[A-Z]+%/); for (var i = 0; i < e.length; i++) { var k = this.UpWz(e[i], i); this.childNode[k]=this.childNodes[i] }} } if(baseUrl.match(/verify/)){ result="如果没获取到目录，说明验证码不对，详情页刷新重新获取验证码" }else{if(baseUrl.match(/\d+_2\.html/)){ content.load(); result=content.childNode.join("
");}else{ result=java.getElements("#chaptercontent@p") } }

bookSourceComment:
by·holzora
tips: 
本源主要为R18所做，需要搜索健全书籍请自行更改搜索地址或者从发现找书。
搜索R18类需要记录cookie，请登录后划到末尾点击"スマホ用ページ"转为手机版界面，随后点击头部导航的🔍，依次点击"R-18"并确认，最后点击右上角的✓记录cookie即可。

}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  flag=source.getVariable()=="1"?true:false
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.data.vs.forEach((booklet) => {
    array.push({ 
    	    name:String(booklet.vN),
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.cs.forEach((chapter) => {
    	  vip = chapter.sS!="1"?"🔒":""
    	  href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/`+baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]+`/`+chapter.id+`/`;
    	  href=flag?href+",{'webView': true}":href
      array.push({
        name: String(vip+chapter.cN),
        url: href,
        time:"更新时间:"+String(chapter.uT)+"  字数:"+String(chapter.cnt),
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

ruleExplore.author: author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2亿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2万')
    .replace(/\.0([万亿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' · ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + '点击');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + '月票');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    last: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结',
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      )
    ].join(','),
    last:
      o.updteChapterName + ' · ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleSearch.name: name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('作品相关'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.chapterName.replace(/^正文\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'http://huayu.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
</js>

bookSourceComment:
搜索关键字格式
─────
完全格式：书名#作者$网站
简化格式1：书名$网站
简化格式2：书名#作者
简化格式3：书名

格式说明：例如，搜索“斗破苍穹#天蚕土豆$www.qidian.com”将会在“www.qidian.com”这个网站中搜索书名为斗破苍穹、作者为天蚕土豆的书籍
header: {"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_13_3) AppleWebKit/604.5.6 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/11.0.3 Safari/604.5.6"}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
flag=source.getVariable()=="1"?true:false

var json=java.getElement("@css:.volume-wrap h3,.volume-wrap li");
list=[];
for(i in json){
	vol=json[i].select("a").attr("class");
	if(vol.indexOf("subscri")!=-1){
		volname=json[i].text();
		list.push({
			text:"★"+String(volname).replace(/.共\d+章.*|.订阅本卷/g,'')+"★",
			voltype:true
			})
		}else{
a=json[i].select("a")
			vip=json[i].select("em.iconfont").text()!=""?"🔒":""
			
			text=a.text();
			href=a.attr("href");
			time=a.attr("alt");
			href=flag?href+",{'webView': true}":href
			
			list.push({
			text:String(vip+text).replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*?[求更谢乐发订合补加].*?[】）\)].*/g,''),
			href:href,
			time:String(time).replace(/.*?时间：(.*?)章节字数：(\d+)/,'$1•$2字'),
			voltype:false
			})
	}
	}
list
</js>
